'''Turtle scutes''' are [[item]]s that baby [[turtle]]s drop when they grow into adults. They can be used to craft [[turtle shell]]s which can be used to brew the [[potion of the Turtle Master]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Mob loot ===
Baby [[turtle]]s drop a single turtle scute when they grow up into adults, which is the only possible way to obtain the [[item]].

== Usage ==
Turtle scutes can be crafted into [[turtle shell]]s.

=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{crafting usage}}

=== Repairing ===
Turtle scutes are the [[repair]] items for the turtle [[armor material]], and thus can be used to repair [[turtle shell]]s in an [[anvil]].
